descriptions.somethingWentWrong: Sometimes we encounter issues with a page. These issues are tracked automatically, but if this issue continues feel free to contact us. Meanwhile, try refreshing the page.

titles.somethingWentWrong: Oops! Looks like something went wrong.
titles.noUpdatedRecords: Oops! Looks like nothing got updated.

validations.date: Must be a valid date in the format
validations.datePast: Must be a date in the past
validations.dateFuture: Must be a date in the future
validations.hours: Must be an increment of 0.25 credit hours
validations.email: Must be a valid email address
validations.url: Must be a valid https URL e.g. https://prodigyems.com
validations.minNumber: Must be more than or equals {{min}}
validations.maxNumber: Must be less than or equals {{max}}
validations.emsId: Must be a valid EMS ID e.g. 1234-1234-1234
